data.title: Mansfield Missing Person UPDATE: Samantha Thomas has been FOUND and reunited with her family

data.text:
UPDATE: Mansfield Police Department Assistant Chief Jason Bammann said, "I am happy to advise that Samantha has been located. She was found on Lexington-Springmill Rd near Rosedale Dr. by the Ontario Police Department. Samantha was in good spirits and returned to her family. Thank you to all that assisted us with locating her.

The Mansfield Division of police is currently searching for Samantha Thomas. She is a 23-year-old female who is 5 foot, 4 inches tall, weighs 240 lbs., and has brown hair and Green eyes. She was last known to be wearing a black winter coat, orange flip- flops, and possibly grey pants.

Samantha has also been diagnosed with schizophrenia, autism, and diminished mental capacities.

At approximately 9:54 AM, Ms. Thomas left on foot from her residence at 61 Â½ Penn Ave, distraught, and had made threats to possibly harm herself. She is also not originally from the area and has done this in the past. The last time she was located 10 hours later in an abandoned house.
